title: Social Media Security
longDescription: Social media accounts can expose personal information and are targets for attackers. These measures will help you secure your online presence.

items.title: Privacy settings
items.description: Configure privacy settings on all platforms
items.details: Regularly review and restrict the visibility of your profiles, posts, and personal information on all social media platforms.

items.title: 2FA for social accounts
items.details: Set up 2FA on all your social media accounts using authenticator apps rather than SMS when possible.

items.title: Minimize personal information
items.details: Avoid sharing information that could be used to answer security questions or for identity theft, such as birthdate, hometown, or education history.

items.title: Location privacy
items.details: Turn off location tagging on social media posts and photos to avoid revealing your whereabouts.

items.title: Secure third-party apps
items.details: Regularly audit and remove unnecessary third-party apps that have access to your social media accounts.
